name: Easy Way Aviation Training Center
about: At Easy Way Aviation Training Center, we are dedicated to providing top-notch flight training programs tailored to aspiring and professional pilots. Our state-of-the-art facilities and advanced training equipment ensure a safe and efficient learning environment. With a highly structured curriculum and professional standards, we offer accelerated programs that can take students from zero experience to a commercial pilot in as little as 2.5 years. Our partnerships with major airlines guarantee interviews and career opportunities upon completion. Our commitment to safety, quality, and success sets us apart, making us a premier choice for those seeking a career in aviation. We strive to build the best-trained pilots in the industry, ensuring a seamless start to their careers.
services:
["ATPL Course
Flight Dispatcher Course 
Cabin Crew Course
TOT Course - instructional techniques
Aviation English for pilot.
Aviation English for FD
Aviation English for CC
Aviation English for ING
ELP Level 4 – 5 – 6
PPL & ATPL to Flight Dispatcher"]
